title: Olive breadsticks
description: These pencil-thin sticks studded with green olives are great served with olive oil or your favourite dips for a party.Equipment and preparation: You will need a mixer fitted with a dough hook.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
4 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for oiling
1 x 1kg/2lb 2oz jar pitted green olives in brine, drained
